conversion_verification.notes: 3D cutaway is present with extruded walls (height + thickness), visible interior volume, and an elevated/isometric-like view showing multiple faces per wall; ceiling/roof is removed.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Strong 3D extrusion and readable wall/floor separation; cutaway is clean. View is only mildly angled (close to top-down) but still clearly 3D with side faces visible.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall room zoning matches (living left, dining bottom center, kitchen right, playroom top right, stair top center, closets/WC top left). Some partition geometry appears simplified and a few wall lengths/offsets (notably around pantry/center core and kitchen edge conditions) are not perfectly faithful to the 2D plan.

interior_elements.notes: Living room sofa/TV, dining table/chairs, kitchen counters + island/cooktop, and playroom toys are present and placed in plausible corresponding rooms. Pantry-specific elements are not clearly represented; bathroom fixtures are minimal/unclear beyond a small WC zone.

visual_clarity.notes: Walls/openings are distinguishable with consistent materials and no obvious mesh breaks. Lighting is adequate and does not obscure layout; presentation is clean with no label clutter.

detected_errors.description: Minor-to-moderate layout simplification/offsets around the central/pantry area and some exterior wall segment proportions compared to the 2D plan.
Not all door/window placements and opening sizes appear to match the 2D plan precisely (some openings simplified or shifted).
Bathroom/pantry-specific fixtures and built-ins are not fully or clearly modeled relative to the 2D plan annotations.

summary: A true 3D cutaway conversion with good overall plan fidelity and interior readability, but with some simplified/shifted partitions and imperfect door/window and service-area detail matching.
